text:
Hey folks,

I'm launching a new version of my funded startup that runs on Ember-Cli and need an extra pair of hands to help finish a couple time-resourceful views & components (a performant infinite scroll feed for hundreds of items with filtering by category, a front-end filter for a few hundred elements and a form of medium complexity). I'm looking for an experienced Ember Dev to help me finish them up before 20th of September. Please DM me if you can help or can recommend anyone.
